name: Ananya Bara
title: .NET Full Stack Developer
summary: .NET Full Stack Developer with 4+ years of experience in building scalable applications delivering high-performance solutions that enhance business outcomes.

achievements: Designed and developed .NET Core Web APIs and RESTful services, improving data flow efficiency by 25%.
Built reusable Angular UI components integrated with .NET Core APIs for faster page load and better UX.
Developed 50+ SQL Server stored procedures, queries, and triggers, reducing query execution time by 40%.
Designed and generated SSRS reports for business insights.
Created NUnit unit tests achieving high code coverage, reducing production bugs by 35%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams, conducted code reviews, participated in deployments, and mentored junior developers.

projects.name: Holiday Benefits Management System
projects.description: Developed a front-end requestor portal in Angular 18/19 integrated with .NET Core APIs for real-time holiday benefit submission and approval workflows. Implemented JWT authentication and designed reusable UI components for smooth UX.

projects.name: Employee Directory & Hierarchy Visualization
projects.description: Built hierarchical employee directory leveraging SQL Server recursive queries and .NET Core APIs. Developed CRUD operations with JWT-secured endpoints and dynamic Angular visualization for organizational tree structures.

achievements: Client Value Creation Award for impactful contributions
Kudos Award from Team Lead for delivering high-quality code and mentoring peers
Accenture Life Moments Award for event management and team contribution

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Electronics & Communication Engineering
education.university: Maulana Abul Kalam Azad University of Technology (MAKAUT), Kolkata, West Bengal
